description: PM Narendra Modi today inaugurated Ramayana Bharat Darshnam Mata Sadnam & Statue of Lord Hanuman in Kanyakumari through video conferencing. Addressing the event, Shri Modi paid tribute to Swami
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Today, on the special occasion of Swami Vivekananda's birth anniversary, addressed programmes in Kanyakumari & Rohtak via video conferencing. 

The Kanyakumari Programme was organised by Vivekananda Kendra, which has done exemplary work in furthering thoughts of Swami Vivekananda. Witnessed the inauguration of Ramayana Darshanam, Bharatmata Sadanam, a 27 feet Veer Hanuman Statue & a portrait of Eknath Ranade Ji.

Spoke about greatness of Shri Ram's personality, what Ram Rajya is & about Hanuman Ji's Bhakti & Seva Bhav.
